Articles.Content: Just a short video I whipped up yesterday for your enjoyment.
Really nice.
Man, that awesome, wheres the voice overs from?
Fantastic. do it without mechjeb = 9,999,999 x moar awesomerer

Fantastic. do it without mechjeb = 9,999,999 x moar awesomerer

I did it with mechjeb because it's much easier to record a video that way (so I can push F2 to get rid of the interface), lol. The Duna landing scene was done without mechjeb.

I did it with mechjeb because it's much easier to record a video that way

one of the many reasons its moar impressiver to do it without mechjeb

Still, way cool video. I really liked the voiceovers.

Couple of technical questions...

When did you leave for Duna (elapsed time since the start of the game)?

What was your surface stay time?

Couple of technical questions...

When did you leave for Duna (elapsed time since the start of the game)?

What was your surface stay time?

The start of the video is at 44519895 seconds.

My surface stay time was about 133.5 days.
Excellent! Thank you very much. This will greatly assist the planning of my mission to Duna. 133 days is more than enough to kick around the area I land in and explore.

Awesome Job. Pure originality

Loved every second of it.

PLEASE make more!

You used Mechjeb, didn`t you?

Eather way, this is the best KSP video on YouTube IMO.

Fantastic. do it without mechjeb = 9,999,999 x moar awesomerer

Not sure it'd be possible to do so without looking at the map view during the video. (Unless you're terribly skilled)
Nice. Especially like how you gave the autopilot a GPS style voice, it sounded like the computer from Battlecruiser 3000AD.
Kosmo-not, this is super-nicely done, kudos! You should definitely make more of those if you have the time for it; I still remember your great "My style of Mun Target Landing" video!

Amazing video! VERY WELL DONE!

Two questions though. What was the source of the voice overs and how did you get the reentry effects? Is it a mod that I can download somewhere? Thanks!

Not sure it'd be possible to do so without looking at the map view during the video. (Unless you're terribly skilled)

Only the ascent autopilot and Smart A.S.S. were used in the making of this film. If you're referring to the interplanetary transfer burn, that was manual throttle control.

Amazing video! VERY WELL DONE!

Two questions though. What was the source of the voice overs and how did you get the reentry effects? Is it a mod that I can download somewhere? Thanks!

The voices are from the game Universal Combat or Battlecruiser 3000AD (it's free). I'm not sure if the head shield part I used is available anymore. I got it a few months ago.
Does that lander really have enough Delta-V to take off from Duna and return to Kerbin?

Does that lander really have enough Delta-V to take off from Duna and return to Kerbin?

Thats what i was wondering too. During landing on Duna it uses almost no fuel but i am still skeptical about it.

Thats what i was wondering too. During landing on Duna it uses almost no fuel but i am still skeptical about it.

Maybe you should try it yourself.
